highlights.description: [Subtitle] Fight everywhere. JackeyLove is just farming for himself. Everyone else rolled their characters on the PvP server. JackeyLove rolled on PvE, killing off minions and towers.
highlights.commentary: … IG's JackeyLove pressures the top lane alone and takes down FPX’s outer turret, marking a BUILDINGKILL event in the TOPLANE--a small but crucial step toward regaining map control despite IG trailing 5-12 in kills and over 3k gold.

highlights.description: [Subtitle] Sivir speed boost to the Nautilus, Thresh, and look for those two hooks on to G2. G2 had a harder deal but they found a pick at their own. That will be secured by hooks.
highlights.commentary: … G2's bot lane duo collapses onto FPX's Crisp (Thresh), securing a CHAMPIONKILL with Perkz landing the final blow—demonstrating G2’s attempt to claw back control with a well-coordinated pick despite trailing 2–5 in kills.
